properties.name: Account Administrator
properties.description: Has complete control over the help desk including access to Account or Billing related information, and receives Invoices.

properties.name: Administrator
properties.description: Can configure all features through the Admin tab, but is restricted from viewing Account or Billing related information.

properties.name: Supervisor
properties.description: Can perform all agent related activities and access reports, but cannot access or change configurations in the Admin tab.

properties.name: Agent
properties.description: Can log, view, reply, update and resolve tickets and manage contacts.
